title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, January 22, 2022
description: It was on this day in 1938 that Thornton Wilder's play “Our Town” was premiered at the McCarter Theatre in Princeton, New Jersey.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1938 that Thornton Wilder's play “Our Town” was premiered at the McCarter Theatre in Princeton, New Jersey.
